= Introduction =

How to configure, compile, install and run lb-bind


= Details =

*Configure*
{{{
configure --without-openssl --enable-fixed-rrset --disable-ipv6 --sysconfdir=/etc/bind --enable-threads
}}}

*Compile*
{{{
make
}}}

*Install*
{{{
sudo make install
}}}

*Setup*

Follow [http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=236093 this guide]

omitting this
{{{
forwarders {
     # Replace the address below with the address of your provider's DNS server
     123.123.123.123;
};
}}}

*Run*

Execute named
